1.0.0.name: wordpress/genesis-footer-widgets
1.0.0.description:
Adds 3 or 4 footer widget areas to the Genesis Theme Framework version 1.6 or higher.

For this plugin to work you will need to have the Genesis theme installed and use it - or a child theme of Genesis. This plugin will auto-disable if these requirements are not met.
